response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. This unique item is not just a possession; it's a testament to craftsmanship and innovation. I believe its true worth surpasses $800,000, but I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $750,000.
